fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Spin (Night): Choose a target. If they used an ability, they will be redirected to a different alive non-Unseen player.
- Perform (Night, 2 use): Choose a target. You will perform at their house roleblocking all of their visitors.
- Take for a Whirl (Night, 1 use): The Unseen will receive all whispers sent for the day after this ability is used.
